name: treeverse
description: Treeverse Chrome Extension - Visualize Twitter/X conversations as interactive trees
author: Paul Butler

scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build:content && concurrently "vite build --watch --mode development" "npm run watch:content"
scripts.build:dev: vite build --mode development && npm run build:content
scripts.build:content: tsc src/content/main.ts --outDir dist/resources/script --target ES2020 --module ESNext --moduleResolution node && mv dist/resources/script/main.js dist/resources/script/content.js || true
